content: विच्छेदः {@--1@} Cutting asunder, cutting, dividing, separation; <ls>Māl. 6. 11.</ls> {@--2@} Breaking; <ls>Śi. 8. 51.</ls> {@--3@} Break, interruption, cessation, discontinuance; विच्छेदमाप भुवि यस्तु कथाप्रबंधः <ls>K.</ls>; पिंडविच्छेददर्शिनः <ls>R. 1. 66.</ls> {@--4@} Removal, prohibition. {@--5@} Dissension. {@--6@} A section, or division of a book. {@--7@} Interval, space. {@--8@} Interruption in family succession, failure of issue.
